About US

Power resides where the King Meme decides it resides.

The kingdom of Grok-powered memes has waxed strong and flourished in abundance. God-green candles are nearly the norm. Yet, It’s found no one worthy to lead the movement towards dominating the meme kingdoms across chains. The fearless & brave King Grok is born to unite the tribes of Grok memes for the greatest meme takeover. We win or we die. 

Stack up your bags, FOMO is coming!
